data.what_is:
Plezi helps marketing professionals by providing them with guidance on publishing, promoting and automating each piece of content.
Plezi software isn't just a toolbox: it guides you through each marketing action and shows the next step so you can focus purely on producing outstanding content.
Manual workflows are obsolete: each lead has their own buying cycle.
Using Plezi is like having a marketer behind each one of your leads. Every automated workflow is unique and adapts in real time to your leads' online actions, sending them the most relevant content.
data.product_description: Plezi is a startup that offers a SAAS solution for Marketing Automation to B2B companies wishing to develop their Inbound Marketing strategy. Plezi is the Inbound Marketing solution that will revolutionize the way you market and turn your content into leads!

pricing_plans.plan_description: For busy B2B marketers and founders who want to start generating leads on their website and know what they do online.
For busy B2B marketers and founders who want to engage their contacts base and see what they do online.
For busy B2B marketers and founders who need to build a marketing machine and boost sales.
For busy B2B marketing teams who need to deliver high quality leads to their sales team and leverage every content they produce to shorten the sales cycle.
plan_features: Smart campaign (c): based on persona, offer, buying stage and intents

initial_reviews.review_title: A simple et easy to install marketing automation
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plezi?
The customer support
The customer success manager
The help to configure the solution

Plezi is simple and easy to use and to implement.

What do you dislike about Plezi?
Waiting for the new version for an improved usage of importing, content management.

What problems is Plezi solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to have a simple b2b marketing automation tool

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plezi?
Very simple interface to support our inbound strategy
Pro-active support and very helpful CSM
A single interface to manage our content, landing page, social networks

What do you dislike about Plezi?
Integration with Salesforce not easy and not simple to connect the forms

Recommendations to others considering Plezi:
It's important to define your content strategy before implementing a inbound tool like plezi.

What problems is Plezi solving and how is that benefiting you?
Centralize my tools into a single plane of glass
Dashboard to follow the performance of our content strategy
